headline: Is Salesforce (CRM) Still Attractive After A Mixed Year Of Share Price Moves
summary: If you are wondering whether Salesforce at around US$262.90 is a bargain or already pricing in big expectations, you are not alone. The stock is roughly flat over the last month with a 0.9% return, up 3.7% year to date, but still shows an 18.6% decline over the past year after a strong 80.5% gain over three years and 23.5% over five years. Recent headlines have focused on Salesforce's role as a major software player and its ongoing push to refine its product suite and customer offerings...
